label: ESPC Radial velocity (away from) standard deviation over the scatter patch of water current relative to instrument in the water body by high frequency radar
definition: Standard deviation of the component of water velocity in a water body along radial lines centered at the HFR antenna, evaluated over the scatter patch
comment: water current; water body; at the surface; standard deviation; over the scatter patch; sea; velocity; radial; positive away from the instrument; relative to the instrument
